name: PlantToy
description:
It's PlantToy! But it's just a seedling now...

Click buttons and plant plants, remember what plant button you clicked last, because I still haven't added UI that tells you what plant you have selected. Sorry.

Harvest the plants when they grow, earn score! Wait 100 turns, brag to your friends about being cool enough to experience PlantToy!

Refresh the page to restart 'cause I didn't add UI to reset the scene. Sorry.

⁽ᴵᵗ'ˢ ᴾˡᵃⁿᵗᵀᵒʸᵎ⁾
